entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
